Uses of Class
org.apache.ignite.ml.composition.boosting.GDBLearningStrategy

  • Packages that use GDBLearningStrategy 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.ml.composition.boosting
    Contains Gradient Boosting regression and classification abstract classes allowing regressor type selecting in child classes.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.boosting
    Contains implementation of gradient boosting on trees.
